definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile

sentences.english: The Wealth Creation Series is a series of 8 one-minute episodes.
sentences.chinese: 致富系列是一套八集，每集一分钟的电视特辑。

sentences.english: We will let you know when the songs and the specials will be released when we know.
sentences.chinese: 我们一知道了新歌和特辑的发布时间，就会告诉你。

sentences.english: Anyone giving $10 or more will be able to download a collection of new songs.
sentences.chinese: 捐款10美元及以上的人们可以下载新歌特辑。

sentences.english: The new pilot is called Ghost Hunters: College Edition.
sentences.chinese: 新一期的节目叫做幽灵猎人校园特辑。

sentences.english: Do you want to see a Transformers 3 Trailer on this Featurette?
sentences.chinese: 你想在这个特辑看到一个变形金刚3预告片？

sentences.english: Their second album, Ancora, was released in November 2005.
sentences.chinese: 在2005年他们出版发行第二张特辑“安科拉”。

sentences.english: Protecting the President is this month's National Geographic Channel feature.
sentences.chinese: 本月份国家地理频道播出《第一保镖》特辑。

definition: news from behind the scenes/stage gossip
painted eggshell/Easter egg/(media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc)/post-credits scene
variant of 紀錄片|纪录片[ji4 lu4 pian4]
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
